title: Inception
description: A skilled thief is given a chance at redemption if he can successfully perform an inception—planting an idea deep within a person's subconscious.

title: The Matrix
description: A computer hacker learns that reality as he knows it is an illusion and joins a rebellion against its controllers.

title: Interstellar
description: A team of explorers travels through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

title: The Dark Knight
description: Batman faces his greatest adversary, the Joker, as chaos spreads across Gotham City.

title: Avatar
description: A paraplegic marine is dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission, where he becomes torn between following orders and protecting the planet.

title: Pulp Fiction
description: Interwoven stories of crime, redemption, and unexpected twists in Los Angeles.

title: Forrest Gump
description: The life journey of Forrest Gump, a man with a good heart who inadvertently influences historical events.

title: Gladiator
description: A betrayed Roman general seeks vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family.

title: Titanic
description: A love story unfolds between two passengers aboard the ill-fated Titanic.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: A man wrongly imprisoned for murder forms a lasting bond with a fellow inmate while finding hope within the walls of Shawshank.

title: Rambo III
description: Rambo bestreitet eine Ein-Mann-Mission, um seinen Freund Colonel Trautman aus den Fängen der gewaltig einfallenden sowjetischen Streitkräfte in Afghanistan zu retten.

title: Dune: Part Two
description: Paul Atreides schließt sich mit Chani und den Fremen zusammen, um sich an den Verschwörern zu rächen, die seine Familie zerstört haben.

title: Magazine Dreams
description: Ein schwarzer Amateur-Bodybuilder kämpft in dieser Erkundung von Berühmtheit und Gewalt darum, eine menschliche Verbindung zu finden.
